description: Potential for unauthorized access to admin functions due to lack of proper access control checks.
recomendation: Implement stricter access control mechanisms to ensure only authorized users can access admin functions.

description: Risk of setting a non-contract address as implementation, leading to potential contract failures.
recomendation: Enhance validation checks to ensure that only contract addresses can be set as implementations.

description: Fallback function can be called by anyone, which may lead to unexpected behavior.
recomendation: Consider adding restrictions to the fallback function to limit its accessibility.

description: Use of deprecated Solidity version (0.4.24) which may have known vulnerabilities.
recomendation: Upgrade to a more recent and supported version of Solidity.
